column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at the Southern Split:
column4: The middle and right lanes are blocked until further notice due to investigation of a serious single vehicle collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at the Southern Split:
column4: Traffic is backed up past Exit 115 (Newtown Pike).

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S at the Southern Split:
column4: UPDATE:  Police expect to temporarily shutdown ALL LANES between approximately 8:45 a.m. and 9 a.m.
